text: Marek Czekalski (6 June 1953 – 2 April 2021) was a Polish politician and engineer. He was Mayor of Łódź from 1994 to 1998. Czekalski died on 2 April 2021 at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish mayors Category:Polish engineers Category:Politicians from Łódź
title: Marek Czekalski
